title: New: The Shins – Simple Song
body:
Here it is, four years in the making; the first slither of new material from **The Shins** in the form of the ludicrously anthemic _Simple Song_.

Without meaning to sound cliched, it is relatively straightforward for a comeback single, channeling **Mercer’s** folk-pop influences into a four minute treat. With their fourth album [**_Port Of Morrow_**](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/13116-news-the-shins-announce-new-album/) out in March, here’s hoping for a full UK tour in support of the record.
